sentences.en: All is orderly and beautiful; everything is charming to the eye.
sentences.cn: 一切都井井有条,美不胜收, 一切都赏心悦目.

sentences.en: At age 60, my life that in an orderly way had greatly changed, uncertainly.
sentences.cn: 在60岁时，我一向有条不紊的生活风云骤起，充满变数。

sentences.en: Despite the violence that preceded the elections, reports say that polling was orderly and peaceful.
sentences.cn: 虽然选举之前有过暴力事件，但有报道称投票过程秩序井然，波澜不惊。

sentences.en: I gave up the shelter of an orderly, purposeful, lawful existence.
sentences.cn: 我放弃了那种规规矩矩、正正经经 、 有目标的生活.

sentences.en: I waked the orderly and he poured mineral water on the dressings.
sentences.cn: 我喊醒勤务,他在我的绷带上倒了些矿质水.

sentences.en: It's a beautiful, clean and orderly city.
sentences.cn: 这是一座美丽清洁、秩序井然的城市。

sentences.en: She needs to organize her ideas in a more orderly way.
sentences.cn: 她需要把自己的想法组织得更有条理些。

sentences.en: The books are in orderly rows on shelves.
sentences.cn: 书籍整齐地排列在书架上.

sentences.en: The buildings in this area are laid out in an orderly fashion.
sentences.cn: 这一片建筑物的布局十分规则.

sentences.en: The elections were conducted in an orderly fashion.
The officers and crew prepared to abandon ship in an orderly fashion.
sentences.cn: 全体船员秩序井然地准备弃船。

sentences.en: The organizers guided them in orderly fashion out of the building.
sentences.cn: 组织者引领他们井然有序地走出大楼。

sentences.en: The senior leaders lined up behind him in orderly rows.
sentences.cn: 高级将领整齐有序地在他身后站成几排。

sentences.en: Their vehicles were parked in orderly rows.
sentences.cn: 他们的车一排排井然有序地停放着。

sentences.en: Though I tried to be orderly, I lived in perpetual confusion.
sentences.cn: 我虽然力求整洁, 但永远生活在混乱之中.
